meta-title: Programming with passion - articles about frontend, backend and more
meta-description: Are you looking for a reliable source of information about programming and web development? Visit our website where you can find articles about frontend, backend, and other programming topics.

about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: My name is Damian and I'm 23. I love learning new things. I'm curious about all frameworks and libraries created by languages of programming. I hope my articles will be helpful for you.

not-found.title: No articles found matching the given keywords
not-found.description: When no articles match your search keywords, try using different keywords or criteria to broaden results.
